name: bAdger Team v.1.1
description:
Fixes:

- Checkpoints added 

- Removed some of the dead zones and enemies to make it more playable

 - Red door fix so that other badgers can open doors too 

- The camera changed to follow the swapped player 

- A simple menu and Application.Quit on Escape added

Assets used: Corgi Engine - 2D + 2.5D Platformer Platform Game Assets Ultimate Bacground music Back On Track - FunFant
